name: seasons-systems
description: Seasons Systems is a comprehensive agribusiness management platform designed to streamline and digitize the operations of agricultural enterprises. It features modular management for HR, Procurement, Equipment & Inventory, Sales, and Field Management, with role-based access, analytics, AI-powered planning, and in-app communication.

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && node server.js
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist backend/public
